titles.title: District of Columbia Medicaid Reimbursement Act of 2006
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to increase the Federal medical assistance percentage for the District of Columbia under the Medicaid Program to 75 percent.
District of Columbia Medicaid Reimbursement Act of 2006

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: District of Columbia Medicaid Reimbursement Act of 2006 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to increase the Medicaid federal medical assistance percentage (FMAP) for the District of Columbia from 70% to 75%.
